alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 8:51PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Los Angeles County through 945 PM PDT... At 841 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorm between Adelanto and Hesperia in western San Bernardino county, This line of thunderstorms was moving southwestward at 25 mph towards eastern portions of Los Angeles county. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, brief heavy downpours, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Los Angeles...Wrightwood...San Dimas...Glendora...Pomona... Pearblossom...Llano...Littlerock...La Verne...Diamond Bar... Saddleback Butte State Park...Big Pines...Claremont...Covina... and Walnut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
